column4: Hi all. I need some assistance here with something in Ubuntu Lucid 64. I've already tried asking for help elsewwhere, and gotten no response.

Basically, what I'm trying to do, is install Vmware workstation 7.1 64-bit version onto my Ubuntu laptop here. One thing it wants to do is change the number of allowed file descripters. But in the end the installer fails to do what it needs to do-and nothing changes. WHy?
And note this happens when I'm trying to execute the installer as it asks with root permissions.
is the installer graphical or text-based?
